name: YOW 2014 - MVVM Implementation in Android
tagline: MVVM Implementation in Android using RoboBinding and Java Beans Property Change Listener demostrated at YOW Connected 2014
body:
### YOW Connected 2014 - MVVM Implementation in Android.
This project contains sample projects related to talk "Write cleaner, maintainable and testable code in Android using MVVM" delivered by Adil Mughal at YOW Connected 2014

### Author
@adilmughal

### Support or Contact
Please tweet me at [adilamughal](http://twitter.com/adilamughal)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
